content: Hi All, Need help regarding how to add extension to resource element for eg I want to add extension (Identifier Status) to Identifier element of HealthcareService resource.
You just want to know what the XML or JSON looks like or you want instructions on how to do it using one of the reference implementations?

You just want to know what the XML or JSON looks like or you want instructions on how to do it using one of the reference implementations?

Hi Lloyd, Thanks for your reply,
It would be helpful if you are able to provide reference implementation using C#. Adding extension to direct resource is working but when I am trying to add the extension in one of the node of resource its not working.

Hi Mahesh! There is a dedicated stream for the C# reference implementation here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179171-dotnet
I'm sure we can help you out there :)
